metadata.title: CVE-2024-1548 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the fullscreen notification by using adropdown select input element. This could have led to user confusion andpossible spoofing attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123,Firefox ESR < 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
